channel.title: [530] [C#] Project Odin
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/CYrqJ.png[/img][/center]
Project Odin is a Server written in C#, based off of [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,499885.0.html]sspoke's RuneScape 2 #C Server[/url]. I appreciate his work, but there are many bugs that Project Odin will fix, and many things that will be added. I really wanted to continue on with this project, and I'm spending most of my time working on it. I've spent lots of time fixing bugs and adding new features. Here is a map/list of what I would like to do with(I'll add more later) Project Odin:
[center] ~NPCs fix grand exchange NPCs
~Systems Clans
Internet Relay Chat System ported from fCraft(thanks Matvei 'fragmer' Steferov for permission)
~Minigames Castle Wars
~Fixes/Misc. Item fixes
NPC fixes
Configurable Settings
NPC Clipping
Appearance saving
clipping while following [/center]
Although I did start the project recently, I do want to expand the features. I will not implement anything that isn't stable.
P.S. I'll add pictures later; I have to go to class ;).
-Moose

item.title: [530] [C#] Project Odin
